cosmic_ray_image = np.array([[False, False, False], [False, False, False],
    [False, True, False]])
mask = msk.Mask.from_cosmic_ray_image(shape=(3, 3), frame_geometry=ci_frame
    .FrameGeometry.euclid_top_right(), cosmic_ray_image=cosmic_ray_image,
    cosmic_ray_parallel_buffer=2)
assert (mask == np.array([[False, True, False], [False, True, False], [
    False, True, False]])).all()
